import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { // useEffect executa imediamente quando o componente é chamado const fetchProduct = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return ( <>

{product_clicked.name}

 Price: ${product_clicked.price} Description: {product_clicked.description} Price: ${product_clicked.price} Status: {product_clicked.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
